label: AM Everything
description: All AM log sources combined (access, activity, authentication, config, core)

label: AM Access
description: AM access audit logs - incoming requests with who, what, when, and response

label: AM Activity
description: AM activity audit logs - sessions, identity changes, object state changes

label: AM Authentication
description: AM authentication events - per-node and journey-level login results

label: AM Config
description: AM configuration changes with before/after state

label: AM Core
description: AM core debug logs (DEBUG in dev/sandbox, WARNING+ in staging/prod)

label: IDM Everything
description: All IDM log sources combined (access, activity, authentication, config, core, recon, sync)

label: IDM Access
description: IDM access audit logs - REST endpoint invocations and scheduled tasks

label: IDM Activity
description: IDM activity audit logs - managed/system object changes with changedFields

label: IDM Authentication
description: IDM authentication events for /openidm endpoint operations

label: IDM Config
description: IDM configuration changes with changedFields and revision

label: IDM Core
description: IDM core debug logs (FINE in dev/sandbox, INFO/WARNING+ in staging/prod)

label: IDM Recon
description: IDM reconciliation events (disabled by default, requires enabling recon event handler)

label: IDM Sync
description: IDM automatic sync changes - live sync and implicit sync with situations and actions

label: Environment Access
description: Environment audit logs - ESV changes, promotions, and configuration modifications

label: WS-Fed Everything
description: All WS-Federation log sources combined

label: WS-Fed Activity
description: WS-Federation user authentication events (AUTHN_REQUEST, SSO, etc.)

label: WS-Fed Config
description: WS-Federation configuration changes

label: WS-Fed Core
description: WS-Federation core debug logs

label: CTS Store
description: Core Token Service store logs

label: CTS Access
description: CTS access logs

label: User Store
description: User store directory logs

label: User Store Access
description: User store access logs
